data.title: WMOA 1490 Radio: Contact Information, Journalists, and Overview
data.meta_description: Use Muck Rack to learn more about WMOA 1490 Radio and connect with journalists at WMOA 1490 Radio.
data.text:
The Adelphhia Summer Concert Series has announced they will return for another summer of fun and entertainment in downtown Marietta. Three acts have been announced thus far. The Wallflowers will be performing on June 28th. Two more shows are scheduled for the 12th and 13th of July. On the 12th, the Pop 2000 tour comes to town. Chris Kirkpatrick from the Band NSYNC will host the tour. Four acts will be performed on the 12th. Otown, BBMak, LFO, and Ryan Cabera.
